2023/7/25: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
相信自己可以，你就已經成功了一半
2023/7/26: Life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
人生就像一盒巧克力，你永遠不知道會吃到什麼口味
2023/7/27: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
教育是你可以用來改變世界的最有力武器
2023/7/29: Spoken words are more powerful than you think.
說出的話語比你想像的更有力量
2023/7/31: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
2023/8/1: May the Force be with you.
2023/8/2: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
真正的智慧就在於知道自己一無所知
2023/8/3: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
恐懼囚禁你，希望讓你自由
2023/8/4: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
做出卓越工作的唯一方式，就是熱愛所做之事
2023/8/6: To live but not just to exist.
要活著，而不僅僅只是存在
2023/8/8: Where there is hope, there is life.
有希望存在的地方，就有生命
2023/8/9: Don’t cry because it’s over; smile because it happened.
別因為結束而哭泣，要因為曾經發生而微笑
2023/8/10: Why not find some time to be kind to yourself?
何不找些時間善待自己
2023/8/11: How much did they pay you to give up on your dreams?
他們付了你多少錢，讓你放棄了你的夢想？
2023/8/12: 為人生而工作，而非只是工作
